page.description: This example uses the cordova-touch-id plugin to verify the user's identiy with the on device fingerprint scanner.
page.discussion: This template can be used to create an iOS PhoneGap application that uses the fingerprint scanner on iOS devices to verify the user's identity. The UX Component uses the cordova-touch-id plugin to interact with the fingerprint scanner. Before the user can interact with the app, they must first verify their identity using the fingerprint scanner. When the user is authenticated, a second panel card transitions into view.

section.note: This template will only work on iOS iPhone 5S and later.
